title: Healing with Honey
text: Honey use and production have a long and varied history as an ancient activity.
longtext: Honey use and production have a long and varied history as an ancient activity. Several cave paintings in Cuevas de la Araña in Spain depict humans foraging for honey at least 8,000 years ago
